description.message:
Welcome to the Program Management Module (PMM) Installer!

Program Management Module is a standard framework to track, manage and deliver programs, services, and service deliveries.

*IMPORTANT*: Salesforce does not recommend installing upgrades directly in production organisations. Instead, install Program Management Module in one of your free sandbox environments or a developer organization first.

Salesforce.org Program Management Module (“PMM”) is an extensible application with open source and closed source components to address the unique core needs of program management. PMM utilizes a Salesforce.com, Inc. (“Salesforce”) managed package to provide nonprofits with a path to centralize programmatic information in order to more effectively manage and deliver programs and services. Program Management Module provides out-of-the-box translations for Spanish, French, German, Dutch, and Japanese.

Once you've installed Program Management, check out the resources in our documentation:

* [Program Management Module Documentation](https://powerofus.force.com/s/article/PMM-Documentation)

Questions? Become a member of the [Program Management Module](https://powerofus.force.com/s/group/0F91E000000bs8XSAQ/program-management-module) customer group in the Power of Us Hub.

error_message.message: To get help with this error, go to help.salesforce.com, find the Support & Services area and log a technical support ticket with Salesforce. Include “PMM” in the subject line and include in your comment the installation link shown here.

title.message: Install Nonprofit Cloud Program Management Module
